description: This file implements a REST API for a chess game backend using FastAPI. It provides endpoints for health checks, retrieving game state, making moves, fetching move history, and restarting the game. The API interacts with an in-memory game engine and uses schema validation for request and response data.

classes.name: GameStateSchema
classes.description: Schema representing the current state of the chess game, including board configuration, current turn, and game status.

classes.name: HistoryResponseSchema
classes.description: Schema representing the move history response, including a list of move records.

classes.name: MoveRequestSchema
classes.description: Schema representing a move request with source and destination squares and optional promotion piece.

classes.name: MoveResponseSchema
classes.description: Schema representing the response after a move, including updated game state and last move details.

classes.name: RestartResponseSchema
classes.description: Schema representing the response after restarting the game, including reset state and move history.

methods.name: dict health_check()
methods.description: Endpoint for health checking the backend service.

methods.name: GameStateSchema get_state()
methods.description: Endpoint to retrieve the current game state.

methods.name: MoveResponseSchema post_move(payload: MoveRequestSchema)
methods.description: Endpoint to apply a move to the game, validating legality and updating game state.

methods.name: HistoryResponseSchema get_history()
methods.description: Endpoint to fetch the move history.

methods.name: RestartResponseSchema post_restart()
methods.description: Endpoint to restart the game, resetting state and move history.
